backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining dialogue structures, activities, moments, letters, and player game state with start/continue game functions and initial dialogue/activity data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a UI change to replace the 'Local Offline' server status label with 'Online' in admin server controls.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map summarizing all major frontend files including UI screens, game systems, scenes, controls, state, dialogue, activities, minigames, and customization.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Guide for diagnosing and retrying failed IC deployments with steps for checking canister status and redeploying.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/OPS_CANISTER_AVAILABILITY.md: Operational guide explaining canister uptime limits and how to keep the game canister running.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing screen navigation, startup, backend availability checks, admin server access rules, and game launch flow.
frontend/src/config/adminGate.ts: Defines local-only admin username and storage key for unlocking admin features.
Defines the Activity interface and a list of activity objects that affect trust and may unlock moments.
frontend/src/game/audio/useAudio.ts: Provides a Zustand-based audio manager handling volume, mute state, and background music playback.
frontend/src/game/characters/Puro.tsx: Renders the Puro character with idle animation, hover effects, and click-triggered dialogue.
frontend/src/game/controls/MobileControl: Implements mobile touch controls including a joystick, look controls, and jump button with pause/terminal handling.
frontend/src/game/controls/usePlayerCont: Combines keyboard and joystick inputs, manages look/jump actions, and outputs normalized movement.
Zustand store maintaining joystick, look deltas, and jump request state with reset and consume logic.
frontend/src/game/customization/customiz: Lists customization items with descriptions and allowed placement locations.
Defines dialogue nodes and branching choices affecting trust and conversation flow.
frontend/src/game/GameView.tsx: Renders the main 3D game canvas and UI panels, initializes game state, handles audio, pause menu, and scene mount lifecycle.
frontend/src/game/letters/letterTemplate: Provides letter response templates and selects replies based on keyword analysis.
frontend/src/game/minigames/BookSortingM: A drag-and-drop style game where players sort shuffled books into categories and gain or lose trust points.
frontend/src/game/minigames/DrawingMiniG: A slideshow-style viewer of Puro's drawings where viewing each piece increases trust.
frontend/src/game/minigames/HideAndSeekM: A timed hide-and-seek guessing game where players search for Puro among preset hiding spots.
frontend/src/game/minigames/MiniGameLaun: A launcher menu that opens and closes the various mini-games and routes between them.
frontend/src/game/moments/MomentPlayer.t: Displays a story moment with title, scene text, and a close button.
frontend/src/game/moments/momentsData.ts: Defines moment data objects containing titles, descriptions, scenes, and trust requirements.
frontend/src/game/scene/LibraryScene.tsx: A 3D library scene with player movement, jumping physics, camera control, and optional wood textures.
frontend/src/game/state/useGameStore.ts: Defines a persisted Zustand store managing trust, dialogue, activities, customizations, letters, endings, and UI panel visibility with actions to modify each.
frontend/src/game/story/endings.ts: Provides ending definitions with trust thresholds and a helper to select the correct ending based on trust level.
frontend/src/game/story/EndingScene.tsx: Renders the ending scene based on trust level, unlocks the ending, and offers options to start a new game or return to title.
frontend/src/game/ui/ActivityMenu.tsx: Displays available activities, applies trust changes and activity completion, unlocks moments, and closes the menu.
Shows discovered and placed customization items, allowing players to place items in the library and update the store.
frontend/src/game/ui/DialoguePanel.tsx: Handles dialogue progression with trust-based choices, updating dialogue nodes and closing the panel when finished.
frontend/src/game/ui/LettersPanel.tsx: Allows writing letters, queues automated responses, and displays an inbox of sent letters and replies.
frontend/src/game/ui/MomentsMenu.tsx: UI menu listing unlockable story moments and launching the MomentPlayer when selected.
frontend/src/game/ui/PauseMenu.tsx: Pause screen providing resume, quick-access navigation, settings, reset, and optional admin terminal access.
frontend/src/game/ui/SettingsScreen.tsx: Settings panel allowing mute toggle and volume adjustment with a back button.
frontend/src/game/ui/TrustMeter.tsx: Displays current trust level with a label, color, and progress bar.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendAvailabilit: Checks backend health via actor.isAvailable and exposes status state and a helper for one-off checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and status handling via context and AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for game state and mutations like choices, activities, customization, moments, letters, and progress reset.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables and base typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, importing global CSS.
frontend/src/startup.ts: Handles one-time startup initialization including storage checks and asset preloading with reset support.
frontend/src/state/useAdminGateStore.ts: Zustand store providing a persistent local admin unlock gate based on a username match.
Zustand store managing persistent toggling of server access settings.
frontend/src/ui/AdminAccessPanel.tsx: UI panel for unlocking or locking admin mode with username input and feedback messaging.
frontend/src/ui/CreditsScreen.tsx: Displays credits, feature list, and a return button with a themed background.
frontend/src/ui/DiagnosticTerminalOverla: Admin-gated in‑app terminal overlay supporting commands, keyboard shortcuts, and scrollable output.
frontend/src/ui/GameLaunchErrorScreen.ts: Error screen summarizing launch failures with optional technical details and retry/back controls.
frontend/src/ui/GameRuntimeErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches game runtime errors and displays a detailed UI with optional stack traces and a return-to-title button.
frontend/src/ui/ServerStatusIndicator.ts: Visual indicator showing server availability based on app toggle and backend health state.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/commands.ts: Implements terminal command parsing and execution for diagnostics, server toggles, and status checks.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/useTerminalDiag: Formats diagnostic state into readable terminal output lines.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/useTerminalStor: Zustand store managing terminal visibility and output history.
frontend/src/ui/TitleScreen.tsx: Main title menu UI with game actions, admin panel, server-access controls, and server status indicator.
frontend/src/utils/launchErrorNormalizat: Utility that converts raw launch errors into categorized, user-friendly summaries.
frontend/STARTUP.md: Documentation of the startup flow, detailing startup tasks, invocation, and extensibility.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Structured project metadata describing the game’s concept, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature records for a 3D library-set adventure/visual novel. Includes canister backend constraints, admin-gating requirements, and multiple reported startup/runtime errors.
